about_the_game:
This is a relaxing and casual puzzle game that can train your memory and observation skills.

Game introduction

The Angel Academy is a magical academy where humans and elves coexist harmoniously. The after-school life of the academy is always so colorful, whether it is a gentle and lovely elven girl, an athletic girl full of youth and vitality, or a noble student council president... …Here, what kind of beautiful encounter is waiting for you?

Game Features

❤ Twelve unique girls
❤ One-handed mode
❤ Picture gallery is perfectly archived by default

content_descriptors.notes: As long as you match all the patterns, you can see all the characters in the game.

This is a relaxing and casual puzzle game that can train your memory and observation skills.

Game introduction

The Angel Academy is a magical academy where humans and elves coexist harmoniously. The after-school life of the academy is always so colorful, whether it is a gentle and lovely elven girl, an athletic girl full of youth and vitality, or a noble student council president... …Here, what kind of beautiful encounter is waiting for you?

name: My University Girlfriend -18+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a relaxing and casual puzzle game that can train your memory and observation skills. The after-school life in Angel Academy is always so colorful, and the graceful and colorful figures in the club are full of youth and vitality. Here, what kind of beautiful encounter will be waiting for you?
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Hungarian
